1.content:
In a strange universe, two large hands name Master Hand and Crazy Hand are currently bored as they figure out what to do in there time. They then suddenly hear a ominous and familiar voice as they begin to listen to it.

"You two, go find many universes and use your power to turn females into universe size blobs. We will be holding a special Super Smash Sisters Sumo Tournament to entertain us." The voice says as the hands both give a thumbs up and teleports to various universes to search for potential girl to turn into universe sumo blobs.

The universe they decide to target first is...
1.title: The beginning.

11.content: Which universe do they a target?
11.title: A Anime Universe (Choice 1)

113.content: Here in this universe, at least 80 percent of the population has a sort of super power called a quirk. And one of the best hero schools in the country is UA. But...which of these girls will be the heroic sumo girl?
113.title: Hero Sumos

114.content: A series involving ninja and fighting against those who would threaten their way of life. But which ninja or kunoichi will become a sumo sized master?
114.title: Sumo Ninjas

115.content: One Piece, a series about pirates and adventures throughout the sea and the world. Now which girl will be picked to become this universes lucky sumo girl?
115.title: Pirate Sumos

12.content: Which Universe do they target?
12.title: A Anime Universe (Choice 2)

125.content: While Yu-Gi-Oh! is a iconic series, there are some other choices, should we go with Yu-Gi-Oh! or these other choices?
125.title: Other choices

13.content: Which Universe do they target?
13.title: A Video Game Universe (Choice 1)

131.content: A series with the iconic plumber always running off to save a princess. All three are veteran fighters but which one will join as a sumo?
131.title: Princess Sumo

14.content: Which Universe do they Target?
14.title: A Video Game Universe (Choice 2)

info.brief_description: Girls from various Anime and video games are about to become universe size sumo blobs.
info.description:
Inspired by some chapters I made in another Weight Gain interactive, I have now created a full version of them where many girls from various anime and video games are gonna be transformed into universe sized blobs and battle each other as sumos in a Super Smash Bros style.

Before we get into this, there are a few rules you must follow.

1. Nudity, sex, and killing characters is not allowed.

2. Male characters can be added in, but they are not allowed to gain weight, they can support or give encouragement to there fellow female blobs.

3. Please balance the characters between sumo matches, none will be overpowered to the other one, if need to, they will most likely just have to fight with sumo skills.

4. Romance can be allowed as long as it doesn't reach a 18+ rating.

5. Keep story chapters at least a good amount of length, and try to use proper grammar.

6. Have fun and be creative.
